Personal Life Date of Birth2 August 1983 (Tuesday) Age (as of 2023)40 Years BirthplaceBaraut, Uttar Pradesh, India Zodiac sign/Sun signLeo NationalityIndian HometownBaraut, Uttar Pradesh, India SchoolLakshya Public School Baghpat, Uttar Pradesh ReligionHinduism HobbiesReading, Dancing, Travelling, Singing ControversyIn May 2021, she shared a video on social media in which she used a casteist slur. Following this, she was heavily trolled on social media and '#ArrestYuvikaChaudhary' began trending on Twitter. In the video, Yuvika used the slur "Bhangi" for her looks while making a video of her husband, Prince Narula, who was undergoing a haircut. After facing a huge backlash, she took to Instagram to apologise. In her Instagram post, she wrote, "Hi guys I didn’t kw the meaning about that word wt I used in my last vlog I didn’t mean to hurt anyone and I can never do that to hurt someone I apologise to each n every one I hope you understand love you all.” Later, she was charged under the SC/ST Act. In October 2021, the Punjab and Haryana High Court granted her interim bail. Relationships & More Marital StatusMarried Affairs/Boyfriends• Vipul Roy (Actor)

Some Lesser Known Facts About Yuvika Chaudhary

Does Yuvika Chaudhary smoke?: No

Does Yuvika Chaudhary drink alcohol?: No

She was approached for the role of Simran in the blockbuster film, “Lage Raho Munna Bhai (2006).” Later, Dia Mirza was chosen for the same.

In 2007, she appeared as a supporting actress in the super-hit film, “Om Shanti Om” along with Deepika Padukone, Shah Rukh Khan, Arjun Rampal, and others.

In 2011, she got her first lead actress role in the film, “Naughty @ 40” opposite Govinda.

Her first Punjabi film, “Daddy Cool Munde Fool (2013)” was a big hit of her career.

She was offered to participate in a dance competition show “Jhalak Dikhlaa Ja,” but she refused the offer, due to her busy schedule.

In 2015, she has been a part of the famous reality show, “Bigg Boss Season 9.” This is the show, where she met Prince Narula for the first time.

She has a fear of crossing the roads and cockroaches.

Apart from being an actress, a few people probably know that she is also a good singer.

In 2019, Yuvika, along with her husband, Prince Narula, won the dance reality show “Nach Baliye 9.”
